byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: M C Taylor's apptmt to Vatican opposed by Luths
snippet: ST. LOUIS, Dec. 31--President Roosevelt's appointment of a personal representative to the Vatican was sharply criticized today in the coast-to-coast Lutheran Hour broadcast of Dr. Walter A. Maier, Professor of Semitic Languages at Concordia Semina...

headline.main: DR. MAIER PROTESTS CONTACT WITH PAPACY; Lutheran Broadcast Attacks Roosevelt Representation Plan

lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS, Dec. 31--President Roosevelt's appointment of a personal representative to the Vatican was sharply criticized today in the coast-to-coast Lutheran Hour broadcast of Dr. Walter A. Maier, Professor of Semitic Languages at Concordia Seminary.
